Posts.Content: 2007survivor wrote: yesterday when I came home from the gym I had a shower I noticed a lot of red spots and blotches on my affected arm, I took a benedryl because I thought it was an allergic reaction In the evening my arm looked like I had a sunburn This morning it is sore to touch My Doctor doesn't answer the phone on Friday What is happening Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: I think my lymphedema is getting worse 2007survivor kareenie
